extends OABase

      • putCookie

        public void putCookie(java.lang.String name,
             java.lang.String value)
        For this to work oaheader.jsp needs to call setResponse() & setRequest()

      • putCookie

        public void putCookie(java.lang.String name,
             int x)

      • setCookie

        public void setCookie(java.lang.String name,
             java.lang.String value)
        For this to work oaheader.jsp needs to call setResponse() & setRequest(). Uses Servlet.Response to create a cookie. MaxAge is set to max.

      • getCookie

        public java.lang.String getCookie(java.lang.String name)
        uses Servlet.Request to get a cookie. For this to work oaform.jsp & oabeans.jsp need to call setResponse() & setRequest()

      • getBrowserName

        public java.lang.String getBrowserName()
        same as calling request.getHeader("User-Agent")
